i18nDemo.title: Internationalization Demo
i18nDemo.subtitle: A demonstration of i18n capabilities
i18nDemo.greeting: Hello! Welcome to the i18n demo.
i18nDemo.howItWorksDesc: This demo uses react-i18next for internationalization. Translation files are stored in the locales directory.
i18nDemo.usageDesc: To use i18n in your components, import the useTranslation hook and use the t function to translate your text.
